subject: Firmware update
description_text:
Hello,
I’m trying to update the firmware, but I’m not being able to do it.
I go to Settings/Update, the pending update shows up, I click on update, the message “Firmware Updating” appears, then the message “Upgrade Complete.”
The firmware loading bar never goes beyond 0%, and the pending update doesn’t disappear.


[cid:ffeb3196-ffef-4d58-8423-484d02114df7]




[cid:a3a9d053-b7f5-4b90-b658-abe08ae55d84]


When I click on Manual Update, I don’t have any file with a recent date to update.

When I go back to the calibration page, I still get the message that there is a new pedal firmware update, and I can’t calibrate. Pressing the pedals doesn’t show any movement in the software’s graphs.


Best Regards,
Pedro Lima

conversations.body_text: Hi Lima Jr,  Could you please provide your pedal model or order number? You can manually update the pedals by going to Settings → Update in the software, then clicking Manual Update at the bottom of the page. Select pedals-firmware → the corresponding pedal firmware and proceed with the update.
